ygData.subject: FW: [eqenchanters] Re: Oh And Also
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve found most of the illusion spells including human and half-elf in Erudin, Qeynos, Freeport, Neriak, Felwithe and Akanon. I dont know what you guys are
ygData.messageBody:
I've found most of the illusion spells including human and half-elf in
Erudin, Qeynos, Freeport, Neriak, Felwithe and Akanon. I dont know what you
guys are talking about. The high-level ones are not everywhere but
everything til level 20 is in all the towns. it's usually a separate vendor.

-----Original Message-----
From: Wanderer CommonWealth [mailto:wanderercw@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 2:57 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: Oh And Also


From: Wanderer CommonWealth <wanderercw@...>


you can find half elf and human illusion spells in
erudin.. Look well though it's in the city

The Wanderer

>

> -Bukaru, Teir'Dal Enchanter Test Server
